sentences.en: A rapid intellect and ready eloquence may carry off a little impudence.
sentences.cn: 头脑敏捷,口才流利,就能减少冒失.

sentences.en: Captain Costigan returned thanks in a speech full of feeling and eloquence.
sentences.cn: 科斯蒂根上尉用充满感情和娓娓动人的话,表示了谢意.

sentences.en: Discretion in speech is more than eloquence.
sentences.cn: 出言慎重胜过口若悬河.

sentences.en: First, there is the eloquence of silence.
He carried his audience along with his eloquence.
sentences.cn: 他雄辩的口才吸引住听众。

sentences.en: He expressed his sentiments about the war with great eloquence.
sentences.cn: 他雄辩地表达了他对那场战争的看法.

sentences.en: He is gifted with rare eloquence.
sentences.cn: 他天生具有罕见的口才.

sentences.en: I am afraid my eloquence did not avail against the facts.
sentences.cn: 恐怕我的雄辩也无补于事实了.

sentences.en: I decided that brevity would be as much appreciated as eloquence.
sentences.cn: 我感到简短肯定和言辞动听一样受人们赞赏.

sentences.en: I exercise in the race his eloquence and ability to cope, to learn some basic manners.
sentences.cn: 在比赛中我锻炼了自己口才和应变能力， 学习到了一些基本的礼仪。

sentences.en: Not every writer could command the eloquence of Tom Praine.
sentences.cn: 以修辞和口才论,很少作家能和汤姆?派恩媲美的.

sentences.en: On the one hand to expand my insight, on the other hand exercise my eloquence.
sentences.cn: 一方面扩大我的洞察力，另一方面锻炼我的口才。

sentences.en: She was charmed by his eloquence.
She was struck by his simple, spellbinding eloquence.
sentences.cn: 她被他那率直、富有鼓动性的口才迷住了。

sentences.en: The hired orators continued to pour forth their streams of eloquence.
sentences.cn: 那些雇来的演说家继续滔滔不绝地施展辩才.

sentences.en: The people were charmed by his eloquence.
sentences.cn: 人们被他的口才迷住了.

sentences.en: Unprofitable eloquence is like the cypress, which is great and tall, but bears no fruit.
sentences.cn: 无益的雄辩犹如柏树, 虽然高大但不结果.

sentences.en: Wealth of words is not eloquence.

words.tran_cn: 意味深长的；雄辩的，有口才的；有说服力的；动人的
